trans-unit.source: Represents the child controls of containers that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表子控制項的容器，支援<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TablePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This control pattern is analogous to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern> with the distinction that any control supporting TableItemPattern will programmatically expose the relationship between the individual cell and its row and column information.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項模式相當於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>區別與任何控制支援 TableItemPattern 會以程式設計方式公開個別資料格，而其資料列和資料行資訊之間的關聯性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Access to individual cell functionality is provided by the additional support of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: 存取個別資料格功能係由<xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridItemPattern>的額外支援

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個快取的屬性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得屬性的目前值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Current%2A>取得屬性

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: 快取的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
trans-unit.target: 識別屬性來擷取與資料表項目或儲存格相關聯的所有資料行標頭。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不存在於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>，而且必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>擷取</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的屬性值，這個<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必須從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>與<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>參考，以取得目前的值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>使用取得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A>取得的快取的值屬性，先前已使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: 目前的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern"></xref>控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式識別項會傳遞至方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>擷取控制項模式，從指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感興趣的</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
trans-unit.target: 識別來擷取與資料表項目或儲存格相關聯的所有資料列標頭的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPatternIdentifiers>同等的欄位

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不存在於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>，而且必須使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>擷取</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TableItemPattern.TableItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
